doc:
Francesco Quinn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francesco_Quinn 0 Francesco Daniele Quinn (March 22, 1963 – August 5, 2011) was an Italian-born film and television actor. The first son of Oscar-winner Anthony Quinn and Iolanda Addolori (Anthony Quinn's second wife), Francesco is perhaps best known for his breakout role as Rhah in Oliver Stone’s Academy Award-winning Platoon (1986). However, his first major role in television was in the 1985 prime-time television miniseries Quo Vadis?. His final role was the voice of the Autobot Dino (Mirage) in Transformers: Dark of the Moon. Francesco_Daniele_Quinn ( March_22_,_1963 – August_5_,_2011 ) was an_Italian-born_film_and_television_actor . The_first_son of Oscar-winner_Anthony_Quinn and Iolanda_Addolori ( Anthony_Quinn 's_second_wife_) , Francesco is_perhaps_best_known for his_breakout_role as Rhah in Oliver_Stone ’s_Academy_Award-winning_Platoon ( 1986_) . However , his_first_major_role in television was in the_1985_prime-time_television_miniseries_Quo_Vadis ? . His_final_role was the_voice of the_Autobot_Dino_(_Mirage_) in Transformers : Dark of the_Moon .
